meanings.definition: The froth on the top of a liquid, such as beer.
meanings.sent1: The barms on the beer looked so fluffy and inviting.
meanings.sent2: I love when the barms on my root beer float are extra creamy.
meanings.sent3: The bartender joked that the barms on the beer were like little clouds floating on top.
meanings.sent4: The barms on the beer resembled a soft blanket covering the golden liquid.
meanings.sent5: As I sipped the beer, the barms tickled my nose with their light touch.

meanings.definition: Yeast or foam used in brewing.
meanings.sent1: The brewery added extra barms to the mix for a richer flavor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for a pinch of barms to help the beer ferment.
meanings.sent3: The barms in the brewing process bubbled like a magical potion.
meanings.sent4: The yeast barms worked their magic, turning the liquid into a delicious drink.
meanings.sent5: The barms danced in the vat, creating a symphony of flavors in the beer.

meanings.definition: The foam or scum formed on the surface of a liquid.
meanings.sent1: The barms on the pond made it look like a mysterious swamp.
meanings.sent2: I scooped off the barms from the soup before serving it.
meanings.sent3: The barms on the hot chocolate seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The barms on the tea were like tiny islands floating in the cup.
meanings.sent5: The barms on the lake shimmered in the sunlight, creating a beautiful sight.
